Package com.example.cmput301w24t33.notifications

Class NotificationRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301w24t33.notifications.NotificationRepository
public class NotificationRepository extends Object
Hosts and manages notification repository

    Interface for handling notification updates.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationRepository

      public NotificationRepository(NotificationRepository.NotificationUpdateListener updateListener)
      Constructs a NotificationRepository with a specific update listener. This repository manages notifications and their updates.
      Parameters:
      updateListener - The listener that handles notification updates.

  • Method Details

    • addEventListener

      public void addEventListener(String eventId)
      Listens for updates to notifications for the specified events. It adds snapshot listeners to each event's notifications and updates the UI through the NotificationUpdateListener.
      Parameters:
      eventId - A list of event IDs to listen for notification updates.

    • addEventListeners

      public void addEventListeners(@NonNull Set<String> eventIds)
      Registers listeners for a batch of events to track their notifications. Each event ID in the set will have a listener added that triggers on notification updates.
      Parameters:
      eventIds - A set of event IDs for which to add notification listeners.

    • removeEventListener

      public void removeEventListener(String eventId)
      Removes the listener associated with a specific event. This stops further notification updates for that event from being received.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which the listener should be removed.

    • addNotification

      public void addNotification(String eventId, Notification notification, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference> onCompleteListener)
      Adds a new notification to the specified event. Upon completion, it calls the provided OnCompleteListener.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to which the notification will be added.
      notification - The notification object to be added.
      onCompleteListener - The listener to be called upon the operation's completion.

    • deleteNotification

      public void deleteNotification(String eventId, String notificationId, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Void> onCompleteListener)
      Deletes a specified notification from an event. Upon completion, it calls the provided OnCompleteListener.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event from which the notification will be deleted.
      notificationId - The ID of the notification to be deleted.
      onCompleteListener - The listener to be called upon the operation's completion.

    • fetchNotificationsForEvent

      public void fetchNotificationsForEvent(String eventId, NotificationRepository.NotificationsFetchListener listener)
      Fetches all notifications for a given event and passes them to the NotificationsFetchListener.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which notifications are being fetched.
      listener - The listener that will receive the fetched notifications.

    • trackAttendeeCount

      public void trackAttendeeCount(String eventId, NotificationRepository.AttendeeUpdateListener listener)
      Sets up a real-time listener for updates to an event's attendee count. When the attendee list changes, the provided listener's onAttendeeCountUpdate method is called with the current attendee count and maximum occupancy.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to monitor.
      listener - An implementation of AttendeeUpdateListener to handle attendee updates.

    • updateEventMilestone

      public void updateEventMilestone(String eventId, String milestoneKey, boolean value)
      Updates event milestones after they've been reached
      Parameters:
      eventId - event whose milestones are being updated
      milestoneKey - determines which milestone is being updated
      value - whether milestone has been reached or not
